sentences.en: Everyone was formally lined up to meet the king.
sentences.cn: 大家拘谨地列好队迎接国王.

sentences.en: He has now been formally given the grounds for his arrest.
sentences.cn: 他现在已被正式告知了自己被捕的原因。

sentences.en: He took her back to Vincent Square in a taxi, saying goodnight formally on the doorstep.
sentences.cn: 他打车把她送回了文森特广场，并在门口正式道了晚安。

sentences.en: His appointment has not been formally approved yet.
sentences.cn: 他的任命还未获正式批准.

sentences.en: It was really too warm for her to dress so formally.
sentences.cn: 她穿得如此正式，实在是太热了。

sentences.en: Mr Dawe was the ancient, formally trained head gardener.
sentences.cn: 道先生是那种老式的、正规科班出身的首席园艺师。

sentences.en: The affidavit was formally read to the court.
sentences.cn: 书面证词正式向出席法庭的人宣读了.

sentences.en: The border between China and Korea has been formally delimited.
sentences.cn: 中国与朝鲜的边界已正式划定了.

sentences.en: The Kingdom of Italy formally came into being on 17 March 1861.
sentences.cn: 意大利王国于1861年3月17日正式成立。

sentences.en: The outlying villages were formally annexed by the town last year.
sentences.cn: 那些偏远的村庄于去年正式被并入该镇.

sentences.en: The police said he'd been formally indicted on Saturday.
sentences.cn: 警方称他星期六已被正式起诉。

sentences.en: They are now formally separated and they will continue to lead their own lives.
sentences.cn: 他们现在正式分开了，将会继续各自的生活。

sentences.en: Today he is formally announcing his candidacy for President.
sentences.cn: 今天他将正式宣布参加总统竞选。

sentences.en: We announced a decision formally recognizing the new government.
sentences.cn: 我们宣布了一个决定，正式承认新政府。
